mapper.select: SELECT ups_spu.id, ups_spu.title, ups_spu.list_price, ups_spu.views, ups_spu.sales, ups_picture.url FROM csmall_ups.ups_spu JOIN csmall_ups.ups_album ON ups_spu.album_id = ups_album.id JOIN csmall_ups.ups_picture ON ups_picture.album_id = ups_album.id WHERE ups_picture.is_cover = 1 AND ups_spu.is_published = 1 AND ups_spu.is_checked = 1;
SELECT title, sales FROM csmall_ups.ups_spu WHERE is_published = 1 AND is_checked = 1 ORDER BY sales DESC LIMIT 0 ,10;

SELECT ups_spu.id, ups_spu.title, ups_spu.list_price, ups_spu.views, ups_spu.sales, ups_picture.url FROM csmall_ups.ups_spu JOIN csmall_ups.ups_category ON ups_spu.category_id = ups_category.id JOIN csmall_ups.ups_album ON ups_spu.album_id = ups_album.id JOIN csmall_ups.ups_picture ON ups_picture.album_id = ups_album.id WHERE ups_picture.is_cover = 1 AND ups_category.parent_id = #{categoryId} AND ups_spu.is_published = 1 AND ups_spu.is_checked = 1;

SELECT ups_spu.id, ups_spu.title, ups_spu.list_price, ups_spu.views, ups_spu.sales, ups_picture.url FROM csmall_ups.ups_spu JOIN csmall_ups.ups_album ON ups_spu.album_id = ups_album.id JOIN csmall_ups.ups_picture ON ups_picture.album_id = ups_album.id WHERE ups_picture.is_cover = 1 AND ups_spu.is_published = 1 AND ups_spu.is_checked = 1 AND ups_spu.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wd}, '%');

SELECT ups_spu.id , ups_spu.title, ups_spu.brand_name, ups_spu.category_name, ups_spu.list_price, ups_spu.index_price, ups_spu.sales, ups_spu.views, ups_spu.tags, ups_picture.url, ups_spu.is_recommend, ups_spu.detail, ups_spu.stock, ups_spu.gmt_create FROM csmall_ups.ups_spu JOIN csmall_ups.ups_brand ON ups_spu.brand_id = ups_brand.id JOIN csmall_ups.ups_category ON ups_spu.category_id = ups_category.id JOIN csmall_ups.ups_album ON ups_spu.album_id = ups_album.id JOIN csmall_ups.ups_picture ON ups_picture.album_id = ups_album.id WHERE ups_picture.is_cover = 1 AND ups_spu.is_checked = 1 AND ups_spu.is_published = 1 AND ups_spu.id = #{spuId};

SELECT ups_attribute.value_list, ups_attribute.unit FROM csmall_ups.ups_spu JOIN csmall_ups.ups_picture ON ups_spu.album_id = ups_picture.album_id JOIN csmall_ups.ups_attribute ON ups_spu.attribute_template_id = ups_attribute.template_id WHERE ups_picture.is_cover = 1 AND ups_spu.is_published = 1 AND ups_spu.is_checked = 1 AND ups_spu.id = #{spuId};

SELECT ups_picture.url FROM csmall_ups.ups_spu JOIN csmall_ups.ups_picture ON ups_spu.album_id = ups_picture.album_id WHERE ups_picture.is_cover = 0 AND ups_spu.is_published = 1 AND ups_spu.is_checked = 1 AND ups_spu.id = #{spuId};
